column4: Hey people. I am having trouble logging in. Gnome complains that .dmrc and $HOME should not be world writable. But they aren't. They are 644 and 750 respectively
are there any other files which could cause the same problem?
not be logged into the desktop
-- you have to be in terminal Failsafe for it to run
on the Login screen choose options-- then sessions then terminal failsafe then type those commands
to get out of failsafe terminal type quit or exit
won't work if you are signed into the account you are trying to fix
I just had this happen to me the other week where I copied a file from an install of 8.10 over to my 8.04 -- different user then tried to delete the file
